com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simlation

Class AbstractNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simlation.AbstractNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Node

    public abstract class AbstractNode
extends java.lang.Object
    The AbstractNode class establishes a base framework for derived classes to draw upon to manage a collection of CRDT objects

      • getDatastore

        public java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,SimCRDTManager<? extends AbstractDataType>> getDatastore()
        Retrieve the data store and return to the calling routine. It will create new datastore if none exists, though the new one will be empty. This routine should never return null, but may return an empty datastore
        Returns:
        the datastore
